title: Hoosiers Nest
credit_line: Bequest of Edgar W. and Bernice Chrysler Garbisch
provenance_text: Indiana State Legislature for the State Library, 1849; the artist, 1850; the artist's husband, Dr. Samuel S. Boyd, 1862; Dublin, Ind., High School, 1865; unidentified descendant of the artist. c. 1929; Minnie E. Bunnell, Hagerstown, IN, before 1954, until 1956; Edward Eberstadt and Sons, New York, 1957; Edgar W. and Bernice Chrysler Garbisch, New York, 1957-80; bequest to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, 1981.
